modName: Deadpool Voice Pack for Dragonborn - DELETED
summary: This mod makes the Dragonborn sound like Marvel's superhero Deadpool.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]NOTICE[/size][/b][/color]

[color=red][b]This mod uses quotes from Deadpool videogame. All sounds belong to High Moon Studios and Nolan North (voice actor). Reposting this mod on other sites is not allowed. PERIOD.Â [/b][/color]

This mod makes your Dragonborn character say all those crazy stuff that you can hear from badass super-duper-hero Deadpool. Awesome, eh ?

[u][color=#ffff00]1) REQUIREMENTS[/color][/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51387/?]Player Voicesets by ChizFoShiz[/url]
[color=#ffff00]
[u]2) INSTALLATION AND USAGE[/u][/color]

1. Download "Player Voicesets" mod and follow installation guide on the mod page on how to instal it. There will be two versions available for download, download the one with the custom voice:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/wqNaJmw.png[/img]

2. After that, download my mod and unpack it in your Skyrim directory foder.

3. Start the game, make sure that u have finished the first story mission "Unbound", it is essential for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51387/?]mod[/url] to work. If you are using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?]Alternate start[/url], then select vanilla start and go through Helgen once again. Exit the fort, finish the mission and then activate the mod in MCM.

4. In the MCM menu, select Custom Voice option, choose desired taunt button and activate the mod.

5. Enjoy !

[u][color=#ffff00]3) CREDITS[/color][/u]
[color=#3c78d8]
[b]High Moon Studios[/b][/color] for Deadpool game
[b][color=#3c78d8]Nolan North[/color][/b] for voice acting
[b][color=#3c78d8]ChizFoShiz[/color][/b] for Player Voicests mod
author: aston94srb
